description:
The Straw Hats and their friends set out to explore Dressrosa, a land full of beautiful women, delicious food, and live toys that walk amongst the living.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bouken! Ai to Jounetsu no Kuni Dressrosa
Explore! A Kingdom of Love and Passion: Dressrosa!
Le pays de l’amour et de la passion. Aventure à Dressrosa !
Приключения! Страна любви и страсти, Дресс Роуз
冒険! 愛と情熱の国ドレスローザ
